description: This is the best noise maker app on the market. It features 13 high-quality sounds that can play endlessly without gaps between loops. All you've got to do is tap the image associated to the sound and relax. You can also set a timer if you "plan" to fall asleep. You can also use this app while listening to music on the phone. Works like magic. The sounds included are: creek, forest breeze, ocean, rain, bonfire, tropical birds, chimes, whales, thunder storm, botanical garden, woodland, fan, running water. New sounds will be introduced as the app will be updated continuously. So don't forget to rate and comment with your suggestion for sounds or improvements. Thanks for buying.
